original_body_lines: The SLIIT Student Interactive Society, the apex student body, successfully hosted ‘Synthesis 2023 – The Magical Harmony’ recently, an evening of epic entertainment and a night to remember for all students.

The celebration was eagerly anticipated among the SLIIT fraternity, as it was the main student get-together held after an absence of two years due to the pandemic and the country’s challenging situation. The event provided the perfect opportunity to welcome first-year students and for all the faculties to celebrate SLIIT’s diversity, talent and camaraderie culminating in an incredible night. The entire event was organized by the SLIIT Student Interactive Society led by President Ranul Deelaka and his team.

Expressing a few words on the occasion, the Chancellor of SLIIT, Professor Lakshman Rathnayake said, “The event “Synthesis 2023 – The Magical Harmony” was a great success, and due credit goes to the Student Interactive Society for putting up a great show for our students. After a lapse of 2 years, the event came as a fresh breath of air where students were able to socialize, enjoy and be part of a highly entertaining event that brought happiness and camaraderie among fellow students. There’s no greater joy than seeing our students enjoying themselves and taking a break from their studies. Congratulations on an event well done.”
